description: This file defines the NotesService class, which implements INotesService. It encapsulates business logic for managing notes, including retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes using an injected repository dependency.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Implements INotesService, providing methods to manage notes by interacting with a repository.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note from the provided DTO, assigning timestamps and generating a new ID.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note with data from the DTO if the note exists.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
